resources.string: Â© Czech University of Life Sciences Prague

This application was created by a research team from the Czech University of Life Sciences in Prague, Faculty of Economics and Management, Department of Information Engineering, within a grant project under registration number 2021A0004 funded by CULS Internal Grant Agency.
In order to recognize a Palmyrene letter from a photo, stone tablet, statue or other source, choose "Draw letter" in the main menu.
In the black field, redraw the letter as big as possible, and when you are done, confirm it with OK or reset with Cancel.
If the letter is recognized, the app will show you, which letter it is in Latin, what is it called as well as Unicode number.
